cookiesverklaring.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesverklaring.intro: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your user experience, ensure the website functions correctly, analyze usage, and, if you choose, display personalized advertisements. Below we explain what cookies are, which cookies we use, why we use them, and how you can manage them.

types.name: Functional cookies
types.description: Required for the site to function properly (e.g., remembering your language choice).

types.name: Analytical cookies
types.description: Help us analyze and improve the site's usage (e.g., via Google Analytics).

types.name: Marketing cookies
types.description: Used to track users and display personalized advertisements (e.g., via Facebook Pixel).

sections.title: 1. What are cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (such as your computer, tablet, or smartphone) when you visit our website. They allow us to collect information such as your preferences, browsing behavior, or device settings to make the website work better and more relevant. In addition to cookies, we may use similar technologies such as pixels or local storage.

sections.title: 2. Why do we use cookies?
sections.content:
We use cookies for the following purposes:

- Functional: To ensure the website functions properly, such as remembering your language or login details.
- Analytical: To understand how visitors use our site so we can improve it.
- Marketing: To show you relevant ads on our website or on third-party websites.
- Personalization: To tailor website content to your interests.

sections.title: 3. Which cookies do we use?
sections.content:
Here's an overview of the cookies we use:

- cookie_notice_accepted (Functional, 1 year, First-party): Remembers if you accepted the cookie banner.
- lang (Functional, Session, First-party): Remembers your language preference.
- _ga (Analytical, 2 years, Third-party - Google): Measures site usage (page views, session duration), anonymizes IP addresses.
- _gid (Analytical, 24 hours, Third-party - Google): Distinguishes users.
- fr (Marketing, 3 months, Third-party - Meta): Tracks user behavior for ad targeting.
- _fbp (Marketing, 3 months, Third-party - Meta): Measures Facebook ad performance.

sections.title: 4. Cookie consent
sections.content:
When you first visit our site, we display a cookie banner where you can choose which cookies to allow. You can:

- Accept all cookies
- Allow only necessary cookies
- Customize your preferences

You can change your preferences at any time via the cookie settings on our website. Refusing non-essential cookies will not affect the core functionality of the site.

sections.title: 5. Managing cookies via your browser
sections.content:
In addition to our site settings, you can manage cookies through your browser. You can:

- Block or delete cookies
- Set your browser to automatically delete cookies when closed
- Allow or block specific websites

Check your browser's manual for instructions. Note: disabling functional cookies may affect the website's performance.

sections.title: 6. Third parties
sections.content: Some cookies are placed by third parties such as Google (for Analytics) and Meta (for ads). These parties may process data according to their own privacy policies. We have signed data processing agreements with them and do not share personal data without your consent.

sections.title: 7. Your rights
sections.content:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

- Right of access: Request access to the data we hold about you
- Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate data
- Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data
- Right to object: Object to certain processing activities
- Right to data portability: Receive your data in a structured format

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@yourwebsite.com.

sections.title: 8. Data processing and security
sections.content: We retain data collected via cookies only as long as necessary for the stated purpose. We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, such as encryption and access control.

sections.title: 9. Changes to this cookie policy
sections.content: We may update this cookie policy from time to time, for example, when adding new cookies or changing our website. Changes will be published on this page, and major updates will be announced via a notice on the site.

sections.title: 10. Contact
sections.content:
Do you have questions, comments, or complaints about our use of cookies?

- Email: privacy@yourwebsite.com
- Phone: [Your phone number]
- Address: [Your company name], [Address], [Postal code and city]

If you're not satisfied with our response, you have the right to file a complaint with the relevant data protection authority.
